name: schedule-manager-workspace
description: Schedule Manager - Automatic time blocking for work, academic, and household tasks

scripts.setup: cp -n .env.example .env && echo '✓ Created .env file - please fill in your values' || echo '✓ .env already exists'
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8765
scripts.install:all: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install && npm run electron:install
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n "API,WEB,APP" -c "magenta,cyan,yellow" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "sleep 5 && npm run electron:dev"

author: Steven
